exceptions.tactic: pose proof bounded_min Pdec n as Hmin.
exceptions.exn: In environment P : nat -> Prop Punb : forall n : nat, exists k : nat, n <= k /\\ P k Pdec : forall n : nat, {P n} + {~ P n} n : nat The term "Pdec" has type "forall n : nat, {P n} + {~ P n}" while it is expected to have type "nat -> Prop" (cannot unify "{P n0} + {~ P n0}" and "Prop").

original: pose proof bounded_min Pdec n as Hmin. destruct (Hmin) as [Hcase1 | Hcase2]. - destruct Hcase1 as [k [Hkn [Hpk Hall]]]. exists k. split. + apply Hpk. + split. * lia. * intros x Hpx. specialize (Hall x). lia. - pose proof Punb n as [k [Hnk Hpk]]. exists k. split. + apply Hpk. + split. * apply Hnk. * intros x Hpx. right. eapply not_lt; eauto.
